author: Mary Berry
serves: Serves 8 as part of a sharing platter
method: Place all the ingredients in a food processor with two tablespoons of hot water and blend until smooth.  Season, to taste, and serve chilled.
ingredients: 2 x 400g/14oz can chickpeas, drained,  1 garlic clove, crushed,  5 tbsp extra virgin olive oil,  2 lemons, zest and juice only,  3 tbsp Greek yoghurt,  a good pinch ground cumin,  plenty of ground black pepper and salt
